lom:description.lom:string:
# This gallery is a unique bank of images developed under the aegis of the IN-VSEE project. These images illustrate the interdisciplinary nature of modern science and engineering and the value of integrating research into education.They represent a cross-section of disciplines and across ranges of size and scale. They are in the forms of: Photographs # Schematics # Animations # Micrographs taken from Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM), Scanning Probe Microscopy (SPM), Optical Microscopy, and surface analytical techniques.
Images in this gallery can be found in three ways:
* browsing through this gallery. * listed in the alphabetical index. * searching by submitting keywords. Caption for sample image: Abalone at 841 microns.

lom:title.lom:string: Visualization Gallery of IN-VSEE Interactive Nano-Visualizatin in Science and Engineering
